tns:patch.author: Alexandru Artimon
tns:patch.description: recreate view, this will always be the last version of the view

script.lang: SELECT settingsvalue FROM amp_global_settings where settingsname='Recreate the views on the next server restart';

DROP VIEW IF EXISTS v_pledges_type_of_assistance; CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW v_pledges_type_of_assistance AS SELECT afp.id AS pledge_id, v.category_value, COALESCE(v.id, -999999999) AS id FROM amp_funding_pledges afp LEFT JOIN ( SELECT DISTINCT ON (1, 2, 3) p.id AS pledge_id, val.category_value, val.id FROM amp_funding_pledges p JOIN amp_funding_pledges_details fund ON p.id = fund.pledge_id JOIN amp_category_value val ON fund.type_of_assistance = val.id GROUP BY p.id, val.id ) v ON afp.id = v.pledge_id;
